about_the_game:
Novus Inceptio: The Official Soundtrack is the first DLC pack and the first soundtrack for Novus Inceptio. It includes a collection of 18 MP3 tracks made by amazing composer Tomas Oliva.

Preview:

Track List

  • 01. Dawn 2:41
  • 02. Over the Horizon 2:10
  • 03. Nightfall 2:52
  • 04. Ferocious Fight 1:22
  • 05. Fear of Death 0:29
  • 06. A New Beginning 1:52
  • 07. Somewhere in a Desert 1:57
  • 08. Strolling Through Nature 1:54
  • 09. Universe 2:04
  • 10. Temple of Ancestors 2:35
  • 11. Shivering 2:48
  • 12. Blizzard 2:20
  • 13. Territory 2:49
  • 14. Corals Can't Speak 2:59
  • 15. Nothing But Sand 2:41
  • 16. Rotting Ambiences 2:57
  • 17. Heroic Act 0:56
  • 18. Hero Reborn 2:48

  • Please note – The Novus Inceptio: Official Soundtrack will be placed in your Novus Inceptio folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Novus Inceptio\Novus Inceptio The Official Soundtrack
